metadata.title: CVE-2014-0213 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities inmod/assign/locallib.php in the Assignment subsystem in Moodle through2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.x before 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of teachers forquick-grading requests.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
